sentences.sContent: How are you doing at work?
sentences.sCn: 你在工作方面进展如何?

sentences.sContent: They get on well at work but not privately.
sentences.sContent_eng: They get on well at work but not privately.
sentences.sCn: 他们工作上相处融洽，但私交不怎么样。

sentences.sContent: The factory will compensate their workers if they are hurt at work.
sentences.sContent_eng: The factory will compensate their workers if they are hurt at work.
sentences.sCn: 工人在工作中受伤，工厂得给予受伤补助。
